summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackFarmacy's fast-absorbing, antioxidant-rich Honey Grail facial oil for all-day hydration + glow! This lightweight, multitasking miracle worker revitalizes skin and helps smooth fine lines and wrinkles.
details: DetailsBenefitsPacked with nutrients. Farmacy's proprietary honey, sea buckthorn, + five-flower oil blend replenish skin with omegas, vitamins + amino acidsGlowing results. Absorbs quickly to leave skin glowy + gorgeous - never greasyFor skin + hair! Use this honey face oil alone or mixed in with your favorite moisturizer or foundation for intense, targeted hydration. Work through hair to tame flyaways + boost shineNon-comedogenic. Honey Grail hydrating face oil has been thoroughly tested by an independent research lab and confirmed to be non-comedogenic so it wonâ€™t clog your pores!Key IngredientsProprietary Honey Blend: Provides skin-loving moisture + nourishment with super soothing and humectant propertiesSea Buckthorn Oil: Packed with antioxidants + moisturizing omegas to guard against free-radical damage5-Flower Oil Blend: Nourishes, hydrates + maintains a healthy skin barrierItem 2635158How To UseApply to face or targeted areas of body as needed for intense hydration morning and nightWork through hair to help tame flyaways and add shineBlend with foundation for a dewy glowIngredientsCocoglycerides, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Octyldodecanol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut)Oil,Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Ethylcellulose,Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil,Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil,Hibiscus Sabdariffaseed Oil,Rosamoschata Seedoil, Honey Extract, Propolis Extract, Royaljelly Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides Oil,Hippophae Rhamnoidesseed Oil,Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract,Citrusaurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Tocopherol, Oryzasativa (Rice) Bran Extract,Water/ Aqua/ Eau,Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Flavor (Aroma)*(*Natural Flavor / Arome Naturel)Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to face or targeted areas of body as needed for intense hydration morning and nightWork through hair to help tame flyaways and add shineBlend with foundation for a dewy glow

reviews.headline: Changed formula is a No
reviews.comments: I used to love Farmacy but they started changing their formulas and now it irritates my sensitive skin.  I tried asking the company about it but some guy named Oliver said they haven't changed anything.  Doesn't he realize you can check online between the older packaging version versus the new one and compare the ingredients list?  LOL

reviews.headline: Love, love, love it!
reviews.comments: I am 55 and this serum leaves my mature skin looking supple, hydrated, soft. My skin loves it.

reviews.headline: Too heavy
reviews.comments: I was expecting this to be more lighweight; however, its a thick oil. I was using dermologica phytoplenish oil prior and it was great for my skin until discontinued. I thought this could be a nice and clean replacement, but it made me break out due to clogging pores. Important to note that I dont typically have sensisitve skin.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Best face oil I've ever used

reviews.headline: Great for dry mature skin - age 49
reviews.comments: I'm struggling with dry skin as I age and this oil has lived up to its expectations. It feels nourishing on my face and my skin now looks healthy and hydrated. My foundation is no longer cakey. I use it with the farmacy moisturizer and ulta dewey face primer.

reviews.headline: Must buy!!!
reviews.comments: Its perfect amount of hydration without beung too oily. A little goes a long way. Goes well under sunscreen and makeup. I "glow" all day!

reviews.headline: Moisturize!!!
reviews.comments: Love this face oil!! Its perfect amount of moisture without being too oily! It goes well under my makeup and sunscreen! Of course i paired it with the Essence and cream as well from Farmacy. The thre together work amazing my sking is so hydrated and "glowy". I like the glowy skin and glowy makeup for reference.

reviews.headline: Absolutely love this!!! Makes my skin feel so nourished
reviews.comments: In love!!!!

reviews.headline: pretty glowy!
reviews.comments: Had some issues with shipping so I went to Ulta and got myself a sample of this in the meantime, and it's fantastic! Super hydrating and glowy without feeling heavy on the skin and it didn't break me out! This review would've been gifted by farmacy if I didn't have the shipping issues.

reviews.headline: Thick and hydrating- great on face and hair!
reviews.comments: This is a thicker, more substantial oil with a subtle honey scent that's perfect for anyone whose skin is on the drier side.  I like to apply it as the final layer after moisturizer to lock in hydration overnight.  Over the past few weeks, it has helped get rid of flakiness and roughness on my face.  Beyond using it for skincare purposes, I love to mix it with matte foundations so I can get the long-wear benefits but with a dewy, radiant finish.  I've also placed this oil in my hair from the mid-lengths down and have found that it has softened my strands, minimized frizz, and repaired damage.  Gifted by Farmacy Beauty.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This was gifted by Farmacy. This seriously makes my face GLOW! I love it so much. Absorbs very well and has helped my skin so much this season. The packaging is super cute as well and it's highly effective.

reviews.headline: Great oil
reviews.comments: I was gifted by farmacybeauty in exchange for my review. I loved this product. It felt so soothing on my face especially after traveling on a plane (so my skin was super dehydrated). It is a bit thicker compared to other oils but doesn't bother me at all. Ive been using it for a week and noticed results already so will continue using and will update my review after a month or so. So far so good and my skin feels soft and moisturized!

reviews.headline: Brought my skin back to life
reviews.comments: Gifted by Farmacy beauty. When I got this oil I decided to use it on my face morning and night. Especially this time of year my skin gets dry and this really brought so much life and hydration back to my face.

reviews.headline: Game changer
reviews.comments: Gifted by farmacybeauty for my honest review. I got a chance to try Honey Grail Ultra-Hydrating Face Oil, and I am amazed how much I love it. It leaves my face so hydrated and refreshed after applying. It goes on my skin very nicely and my skin absorbs it right away. Definitely a game changer for my skincare especially during the winter months.

reviews.headline: Just like honey!
reviews.comments: This product was gifted to me in exchange for my honest review. This is such a nice face oil! The smell is divineâ€”just like honey. It has a sticky texture at first (a little like putting thin honey on your face) but it blends out smoothly and is super hydrating. I have been using in lieu of moisturizer.

reviews.headline: So hydrating
reviews.comments: I have used a lot of Farmacy but never the oil and I really love how nice and thick it is. I like to use this as my last step to seal everything in. It adds a nice cushiony layer to my skin and I wake up glowing and hydrated. Complimentary from Farmacy

reviews.headline: Amazing Hydrating Face oil
reviews.comments: I received this product for complimentary from Farmacy Beauty for my honest opinion. I loved how the Farmacy Beauty Honey Grail Ultra Hydrating Face Oil left my face feeling so soft and supple. The level of hydration that comes in this little bottle is amazing. Easy to use and incorporate with your daily skincare routine.

reviews.headline: Worth the price! âœ¨
reviews.comments: This is my first time trying this oil and I'm actually pretty impressed! During the colder months, my skin gets extremely dry dry and this oil provides the right amount of hydration. I love to pair it along with my gua sha and it has done wonders for hydration and overall skin health! Even though it is a bit pricey, I will always recommend spending a bit more on a product that actually does what it says! ðŸ’› * gifted by Farmacy beauty*

reviews.headline: Obsessed !
reviews.comments: The facial oil has been working wonders for my skin during this winter. It has a very honey light scent. It is not sticky at all and it provides all the hydration thirsty skin needs. I have been obsessed with it. Gifted by Farmacy.

reviews.headline: Recommended
reviews.comments: I was lucky to receive this oil complimentary from Farmacy Beauty in exchange for my honest review. I added the oil to my moisturizer for two weeks, and I've noticed that my fine lines are much less visible! After using this oil, my skin feels super hydrated, and it doesn't clog my pores at the same time! Recommended!

media.headline: I love the honey scent and how my skin looks after using
I love the honey scent and how my skin looks after using
Felt so luxurious on the skin

faceoff_positive.comments:
I recently started using the Farmacy Honey Grail Ultra-Hydrating Face Oil, and I'm thoroughly impressed! This product has quickly become a must-have in my skincare routine.

One of the first things I noticed is the lovely, thicker texture of the oil. It feels luxurious upon application and provides an instant sense of nourishment to my skin. Unlike lighter oils that can sometimes feel too slippery or evaporate quickly, the Honey Grail has a nice, rich consistency that I find perfect for deeply hydrating my skin.

After incorporating this face oil into my routine, I've noticed a significant improvement in how my skin looks and feels. It appears healthier and more hydrated, with a natural glow that I love. My complexion feels plump and well-moisturized, and I appreciate how it helps to lock in hydration throughout the day.

I also love that it absorbs beautifully without leaving a greasy residue, making it easy to layer under my moisturizer or sunscreen. It truly enhances my overall skincare regimen and has brought so much life back to my skin.

In summary, the Farmacy Honey Grail Ultra-Hydrating Face Oil is a fantastic product that delivers on its promises. If you're looking for an effective way to boost your skin's hydration and achieve a healthy glow, I highly recommend giving this oil a try. Your skin will definitely thank you!

I received this facial oil complimentary from farmacybeauty for my honest opinion
faceoff_positive.headline: Luxurious oil

faceoff_negative.comments: I used to love Farmacy but they started changing their formulas and now it irritates my sensitive skin.  I tried asking the company about it but some guy named Oliver said they haven't changed anything.  Doesn't he realize you can check online between the older packaging version versus the new one and compare the ingredients list?  LOL
